item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: App that asks 'why?' every time you unlock your phone (41 points | 8 comments)
2. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (148 points | 50 comments)
3. Hacker in Snowflake extortions may be a U.S. soldier (209 points | 95 comments)
4. I Wrote "Janet for Mortals" (68 points | 7 comments)
5. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (292 points | 175 comments)
6. I Didn't Need Kubernetes, and You Probably Don't Either (200 points | 194 comments)
7. Htmy – Async, pure-Python rendering engine (74 points | 25 comments)
8. Five Companies Produce Nearly 25 Percent of All Plastic Waste Worldwide (34 points | 29 comments)
9. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (231 points | 36 comments)
10. Executing ARM Jazelle (JVM Bytecode) on the Wii's Starlet (63 points | 8 comments)
11. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (321 points | 116 comments)
12. GenChess (205 points | 138 comments)
13. ZetaOffice: LibreOffice in the Browser (154 points | 51 comments)
14. Git-crypt – transparent file encryption in Git (77 points | 27 comments)
15. Mitigating WiFi deauth attacks with Ubiquiti Protected Management Frames (2022) (17 points | 1 comment)
16. Why am I writing a JavaScript toolchain in Zig? (55 points | 39 comments)
17. LLVM-powered devirtualization (209 points | 8 comments)
18. Spies Jumped from One Network to Another via Wi-Fi in an Unprecedented Hack (102 points | 41 comments)
19. Show HN: SQLite Plugin for Jekyll (191 points | 58 comments)
20. The Nursery of the Mac – Apple Computer factory in Cork, Ireland (1996) (25 points | 3 comments)
21. The Many Faces of the Kingdom of Shu (13 points | 5 comments)
22. Show HN: Silent Poems – Visual expression of unspoken thoughts (94 points | 22 comments)
23. FQL: A KV Query Language (42 points | 7 comments)
24. We can mine asteroids for space food (139 points | 163 comments)
25. Creating a social photo frame from scratch (27 points | 8 comments)
26. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (176 points | 100 comments)
27. I Stopped Using Kubernetes. Our DevOps Team Is Happier Than Ever (79 points | 61 comments)
28. OpenAI hits pause on video model Sora after artists leak access in protest (93 points | 66 comments)
29. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (67 points | 34 comments)
30. Imperfect Parfit (11 points | 3 comments)
